I have another project if you're interested. This map of the {@Rgn:30001#refuge} was made long ago by {@Creature:230#1007$$Lashinuk}'s clan, the Consos.

This {@Rgn:30007#pavilion} used to service an army of golems."So?"

So, the {@LinkCreature:30#180#brass conservators} contain instructions in their cores on how to maintain the refuge. Unfortunately, their self-repair systems are collapsing.

If we want to take over for the golems, we must know what they know.

Collect a few {@LinkCreature:30#180$$brass conservator} cores for me to decode.

Beautiful! Active conservator cores!

If you happen by Camp Sagacity, invite Sestena to join me in examining these.
These cores, if we get them intact, will greatly advance our efforts to preserve and repair the refuge.

Naisas has a working core? Several?

Oh, my. What amazing breakthrough for us, .
